quiz.question: What is the primary goal of intervention techniques in organizational development?

options.a: To bring about organizational changes that improve performance and health
options.b: To identify individual employee performance issues
options.c: To reduce overall employee work hours

options.b: Helping organizations identify and understand their own process-related issues

options.b: Only the CEO of the organization
